info.name: Kinja Ungrey Comments
info.description: Makes the grey unapproved comments the same as approved comments

style.css: @namespace url(http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml); @-moz-document domain("gawker.com"),domain("jezebel.com"),domain("jalopnik.com"),domain("kotaku.com"),domain("io9.com"),domain("gizmodo.kinja.com"),domain("gizmodo.com") ,domain("lifehacker.com"),domain("deadspin.com") { /*UN-GREY UNAPPROVED COMMENTS*/ .replybranch-ng .reply.unapproved{ background:#FFFFFF!important; } .reply.unapproved{ background:none!important; } .first-text,.replybranch-ng .reply-content p,p{ color:#000000!important; } .reply-author { color:#d44237!important } .grayscale, .unapproved-container .avatar-mini{ filter:none!important } .replybranch.expanded .reply.unapproved { margin-top: 0px!important; padding-top: 0px!important; border-color: #EEEEEE!important; margin-left: -18px!important; margin-right: -18px!important; padding-left: 18px!important; padding-right: 18px!important; } }
